meanings.sent1: The angular table had sharp corners that could poke someone.
meanings.sent2: The building had an angular design with many sharp edges.
meanings.sent3: The angular chair looked like it belonged in a superhero's lair.
meanings.sent4: Her angular features made her face stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The angular shadows cast by the streetlights created a mysterious atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Measured by an angle or angles.
meanings.sent1: The angular measurement of the triangle was exactly 90 degrees.
meanings.sent2: The engineer used an angular ruler to calculate the slope of the roof.
meanings.sent3: The angular clock hands seemed to be in a race against time.
meanings.sent4: His angular approach to problem-solving always yielded accurate results.
meanings.sent5: The angular view from the top of the mountain was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Moving with an awkward or stiff manner.
meanings.sent1: The robot moved in an angular way, jerking its arms and legs.
meanings.sent2: The old man walked with an angular gait, leaning heavily on his cane.
meanings.sent3: The angular dance moves of the penguin made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her angular attempt at yoga poses left her feeling more rigid than relaxed.
meanings.sent5: The angular movements of the puppeteer brought the marionette to life.
